Summary: I saw a transparent boomerang in the sky over marshall.
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked to the store tonight as usual. However, on the way home when I looked up as I always do it was as if something yanked my head to the side to turn me backwards. It was then I saw the object. I followed its path for about 15-20 Sec. completely mesmerized by what i saw. My entire body tingled. It is colored gray because it was almost transparent. The lights were also dim, as if to add to the transparency, I couldn't believe my eyes.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Marshall
There were no other sightings in Marshall on or around April 12th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
